label: dog
caption: The brown and white dog, its fur fluffed up against the cold, bursts through the snow-covered field with an energetic yelp, its paws leaving behind tiny tracks in the pristine powder. A faint scent of wet earth and winter air hangs over the landscape as the dog sprints towards a nearby tree, where it will likely stop to sniff and explore. The scene is serene, with only the occasional creaking of bare branches breaking the stillness.
